title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.280 - Rehabilitation beds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.280 - Rehabilitation beds

State Regulations

Beds assigned to a service for the primary purpose of
assisting in the rehabilitation of disabled persons through a medical program
integrated with psychiatric, social and vocational evaluation and services, under competent professional supervision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.280

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
